alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of southern Camden County through 1245 AM EDT... At 1155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers, capable of producing wind gusts to 40 mph and funnel clouds over Kingsland, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and possible funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Woodbine, Kings Bay Base, Harrietts Bluff and Colesburg. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
